title: Shows Warmup, Delay, Chal (Challenge) when applicable

custom_expected:

title: Back To Game *
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is playing a game already
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the horizontal scoreboard
custom_expected:
THEN there should be a Back to Game button
WHICH will bring the user back to the in-depth stats for that specific game

*Back to Game should only display when the Calendar is closed*

https://jira.mlbam.com/browse/TVMPFIVE-1670

title: General - Game Start Time Spoilers - On *

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19536)
custom_steps: WHEN the user loads a Live Feed

title: Jog Back 10 Sec *
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has a Audio feed
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks Back/Rewind 10 seconds
custom_expected: THEN scrubber will jump back 10s in game progress

title: Play/Pause *
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has a Audio feed
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the Pause/Play button
custom_expected: THEN the video should Pause/Play accordingly

title: Scrubber *
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has loaded an Audio feed
custom_steps: WHEN the user adjusts the Scrubber point
custom_expected:
THEN user will view:
-Blue design for bar behind playhead
-Light gray design for available feed ahead playhead and until the live point

title: Live - Will advance to live game state*
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has a Audio feed
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the LIVE button
custom_expected: THEN scrub the user to the Live-most point in the game

title: General - Spoilers
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has Hide Spoilers checked in their settings

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19585)
custom_steps: WHEN the user loads a feed
custom_expected:
THEN the Scoreboard will have scores hidden

AND the RHE will have dashes in it

AND highlight playlists will be hidden

AND all Final Scores will be hidden

WHEN unchecked 
THEN the RHE will have numerical values in it
AND the Highlights playlist will not be hidden
AND Scoreboard Scores will be visible
